title: 41- The Socially Distanced SCOTUS
description: The Supreme Court may not be able to meet in person, but they are still doing business over conference call. This month, they've considered three cases about Donald Trump's finances, and whether they should be released to Congressional committees and prosecutors in New York. What does history tell us about these cases which could have major consequences for executive power?
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
